metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37453 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the USB subsystem in the Linux kernel through6.4.2. There is an out-of-bounds and crash in read_descriptors indrivers/usb/core/sysfs.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-37453` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-39-generic - 6.2.0-39.40
linux-image-6.2.0-39-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-39.40
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-39-generic - 6.2.0-39.40
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-39-generic-64k - 6.2.0-39.40
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1017-aws - 6.2.0-1017.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1018-azure - 6.2.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1018-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1018.18
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1018-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1018.18
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1017-oracle - 6.2.0-1017.18
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1018-raspi - 6.2.0-1018.20
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1010-starfive - 6.2.0-1010.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-39.40').
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
linux-aws package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1017.17').
linux-azure package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1018.18').
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needed').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1018.18').
linux-oracle package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1017.18').
linux-raspi package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1018.20').
linux-starfive package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.0-1010.11').
